levels.name: Tactical Transceiver
levels.description: Randomly drops <@ba.vup>{max_cnt}</> bombs within range (especially to enemy's position); Every bomb deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK Physical damage to all nearby enemies
